net.sf.jguiraffe.examples.tutorial.createfile

Class UniqueFileNameValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jguiraffe.examples.tutorial.createfile.UniqueFileNameValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.sf.jguiraffe.transform.Validator

    public class UniqueFileNameValidator
extends Object
implements net.sf.jguiraffe.transform.Validator

    A specialized Validator implementations for checking whether the name entered for a new file does not exist in the current directory.

    In the validation method this class obtains the data object with the content of the current directory (which is available as a typed property from the context). Then it checks whether the name entered by the user already exists in this directory. If this is the case, validation fails and an error message is produced.

    Version:
    $Id: UniqueFileNameValidator.java 205 2012-01-29 18:29:57Z oheger $
    Author:
    Oliver Heger
